problemSuggesstionPlaceholder: Provide a suggestion in case of contestants facing difficulties solving the problem effectively
allowSubmittingOutput: Allow contestants to submit output only (without source code)
customEvaluationNote1: * Use this mode for problems with many correct output, please do not select this for normal problem (only 1 correct result for each testcase)
checkerSourceCodePlaceholder: Source code to evaluate contestant's output

validateSubmit.warningCheckSolutionCompile: Your source code must pass "CHECK COMPILE" step
